title: Asset-Heavy Services
subtitle: reliable execution across complex asset operations

xMatixPlatform.title: Asset-Heavy Services
xMatixPlatform.description1: Asset-heavy service organisations manage complex operations across equipment, locations, field teams, and partners. Execution breaks when asset data, service history, inventory, and workforce systems are disconnected.
xMatixPlatform.description2: xMatix enables end-to-end execution for asset-heavy services on a single operational foundation, ensuring higher asset uptime, predictable service delivery, and operational resilience.

ecosystemSection.title: The Problem
ecosystemSection.description: Most asset-heavy organisations rely on multiple systems to manage assets, service schedules, parts, and technicians. While each system supports part of the lifecycle, no platform orchestrates execution across the full asset lifecycle, leading to downtime, reactive maintenance, and inefficient resource use.

ecosystem.title: Asset & Maintenance Systems
ecosystem.description: Track asset records and maintenance schedules but lack real-time visibility into field execution and parts availability.

ecosystem.title: Field Service & Workforce Tools
ecosystem.description: Manage technicians and work orders separately from asset condition, inventory, and service priority.

ecosystem.title: Inventory & Spare Parts Systems
ecosystem.description: Manage critical spares independently, causing delays and increased downtime when parts are unavailable.

ecosystem.title: Reporting & Analytics Platforms
ecosystem.description: Provide historical performance data without the ability to influence or optimise live asset service execution.

whatIsIt.title: How xMatix Helps
whatIsIt.description2: xMatix acts as the execution layer for asset-heavy service operations, unifying asset data, service execution, inventory, and workforce management into a single continuous workflow. Built on the xMatix Platform, Data Fabric, and Sense, it ensures service decisions are context-aware, policy-driven, and executed consistently across the asset lifecycle.

cardLayoutData.title: How {{highlight}}asset-heavy services{{/highlight}} work on xMatix
cardLayoutData.description: Asset-heavy service execution runs on a shared operational layer, ensuring reliability, visibility, and control from maintenance planning to service completion.

features.title: Asset Monitoring & Service Planning
features.description: Plan preventive and corrective maintenance using shared asset data, service history, and operational priorities.

features.title: Work Order Scheduling & Dispatch
features.description: Schedule and dispatch technicians based on skills, availability, asset criticality, and parts readiness.

features.title: On-Site Asset Service
features.description: Execute maintenance and repairs with real-time access to asset records, procedures, and spare parts.

features.title: Service Closure & Lifecycle Update
features.description: Close work orders, update asset history, and capture costs and outcomes with full traceability and auditability.

requestADemo.heading: See asset-heavy services executed on xMatix
requestADemo.description: Request a demo to see how xMatix connects assets, field teams, and operations on a single execution platform built for asset-intensive environments.
